subject: Football
College Athletics
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: The Bearcats (6-0) used a frenetic, no-huddle offense to overcome deficits of 17-7 and 20-14 to defeat the  Scarlet Knights.
snippet: The Bearcats (6-0) used a frenetic, no-huddle offense to overcome deficits of 17-7 and 20-14 to defeat the  Scarlet Knights.
